QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Dexamethasone suppression test
QAPair.Answer: The dexamethasone suppression test measures whether cortisol secretion by the adrenal gland can be suppressed. It can also help assess the reason for an excess of cortisol in your body such as if it is due to an excess of adrenocorticotrophic hormone (ACTH) secretion by the pituitary.
